system.description: This spell turns normal mud or quicksand into soft stone (sandstone or similar mineral) permanently. Creatures in the mud are allowed a Reflex save to escape before the area is transformed. Creatures that fail are restrained in the stone. A restrained creature can break free with a DC 20 Strength check or escape artist check, or can be dug out. The area of stone can be broken up and removed. Transmute rock to mud reverses the effect.
system.target: Mud or quicksand in an area up to 10 ft. deep and 40 ft. square
